document.full_text: ratko mladic is in a prison hospital at the hague but will go before the war crimes tribunal for former yugoslavia as scheduled friday to face charges of genocide, his court-appointed lawyer said thursday.
document.title: mladic may delay plea to war crimes tribunal
lines_and_colors: ratko mladic is in a prison hospital at the hague but will go before the war crimes tribunal for former yugoslavia as scheduled friday to face charges of genocide, his court-appointed lawyer said thursday.
